metadata.total_anonymous: 100+ additional victims via compensation fund and class actions
metadata.privacy_note: This index includes ONLY victims who have publicly identified themselves by name or who testified publicly. Many victims remain anonymous by choice and are not included here.
metadata.research_notes: All names verified from court testimony, public statements, media interviews, or legal filings where victims chose to identify themselves.

publicly_identified_victims.name: Virginia Giuffre
legal_actions: Giuffre v. Maxwell (2015-2017) - Defamation lawsuit, settled
Giuffre v. Prince Andrew (2021-2022) - Sexual abuse lawsuit, settled
publicly_identified_victims.allegations: Sex trafficking by Epstein and Maxwell, forced encounters with Prince Andrew and others

publicly_identified_victims.name: Annie Farmer
publicly_identified_victims.recruited_by: Epstein approached through sister Maria Farmer
legal_actions: Testified at Ghislaine Maxwell criminal trial (2021)
One of four victims in Maxwell conviction
publicly_identified_victims.allegations: Sexual abuse during visit to New Mexico ranch; Maxwell massaged her naked chest
publicly_identified_victims.testimony: Used full real name during Maxwell trial testimony
publicly_identified_victims.significance: Only Maxwell trial witness to testify under real name

publicly_identified_victims.name: Maria Farmer
legal_actions: Filed lawsuit against FBI for failure to act on reports
Reported abuse to FBI in 1990s
publicly_identified_victims.allegations: Sexual assault by Epstein and Maxwell in 1990s, attempted to report to authorities who failed to investigate
publicly_identified_victims.significance: Among earliest known victims to report to authorities

publicly_identified_victims.name: Sarah Ransome
legal_actions: Filed lawsuit against Epstein and Maxwell (2017)
publicly_identified_victims.allegations: Raped by Epstein and other men up to three times a day for seven months; threatened by Maxwell to comply
public_statements: Featured in Netflix documentary 'Jeffrey Epstein: Filthy Rich'

publicly_identified_victims.name: Courtney Wild
publicly_identified_victims.recruited_victims: Between 70-80 other underage girls at Epstein's request
legal_actions: Courtney Wild v. United States - Crime Victims' Rights Act lawsuit (2008-2020)
Part of 2005 Palm Beach investigation
publicly_identified_victims.allegations: Sexual abuse beginning at age 14; recruited dozens of other victims
publicly_identified_victims.significance: Landmark CVRA case exposed illegal non-prosecution agreement; legislation named after her
publicly_identified_victims.advocacy: Victims' rights advocate, testified before Congress
publicly_identified_victims.legislative_impact: Courtney Wild Crime Victims' Rights Reform Act introduced in Congress

publicly_identified_victims.name: Michelle Licata
legal_actions: Part of 2005 Palm Beach investigation
public_statements: Featured in Netflix documentary 'Jeffrey Epstein: Filthy Rich'

publicly_identified_victims.name: Jennifer Araoz
legal_actions: Jennifer Araoz v. Estate of Jeffrey Epstein, Ghislaine Maxwell, et al. (2019)
Filed under New York's Child Victims Act
publicly_identified_victims.allegations: Repeated sexual assault ages 14-15, forcible rape in 2002
publicly_identified_victims.significance: First lawsuit filed against estate after Epstein's death

publicly_identified_victims.name: Johanna Sjoberg
legal_actions: Provided deposition testimony (2016 deposition unsealed)
publicly_identified_victims.allegations: Recruited by Maxwell while college student, forced into sexual situations
publicly_identified_victims.significance: Deposition mentioned high-profile politicians and public figures

publicly_identified_victims.name: Carolyn
publicly_identified_victims.frequency: Two to three times per week
legal_actions: Testified at Ghislaine Maxwell criminal trial (2021)
One of four victims in Maxwell conviction
publicly_identified_victims.allegations: Sexual abuse beginning at age 14; Maxwell touched her breasts, hips, and butt, saying she 'had a great body for Epstein and his friends'

publicly_identified_victims.name: Jane
publicly_identified_victims.location: Met at camp where Epstein was benefactor
legal_actions: Testified at Ghislaine Maxwell criminal trial (2021)
One of four victims in Maxwell conviction
publicly_identified_victims.allegations: Sexual abuse from age 14; Maxwell sometimes participated in sexualized massages
publicly_identified_victims.significance: First victim to testify at Maxwell trial

publicly_identified_victims.name: Kate
legal_actions: Testified at Ghislaine Maxwell criminal trial (2021)
One of four victims in Maxwell conviction
publicly_identified_victims.allegations: Maxwell set up sexual meetings; massaged Epstein at Maxwell's request at her London home on two occasions

publicly_identified_victims.name: Jane Doe 1
legal_actions: Lead plaintiff in JPMorgan Chase class action lawsuit (2022-2023)
Received portion of $290 million settlement
publicly_identified_victims.allegations: Sex trafficking facilitated by JPMorgan's financial services to Epstein
publicly_identified_victims.significance: Lead plaintiff in largest bank settlement related to Epstein case

anonymous_victim_groups.description: Victims who testified using pseudonyms at Ghislaine Maxwell's criminal trial
anonymous_victim_groups.significance: Testimony led to Maxwell's conviction on 5 counts

anonymous_victim_groups.description: Victims identified during 2005-2006 Palm Beach Police investigation
anonymous_victim_groups.significance: Led to 2008 state conviction and 2019 federal indictment

anonymous_victim_groups.description: Victims referenced in Jeffrey Epstein's 2019 federal indictment
anonymous_victim_groups.significance: Basis for federal sex trafficking charges

anonymous_victim_groups.description: Victims who received compensation through Epstein Estate Victims Compensation Program
anonymous_victim_groups.significance: Largest compensation fund for sex trafficking victims

anonymous_victim_groups.description: Class members in JPMorgan Chase sex trafficking facilitation lawsuit
anonymous_victim_groups.significance: Held financial institution accountable for facilitating trafficking

anonymous_victim_groups.description: Class members in Deutsche Bank sex trafficking facilitation lawsuit
anonymous_victim_groups.significance: Largest sex trafficking settlement with a bank in US history

victim_statistics.age_range_documented: 14-22 years old at time of abuse

advocacy_organizations.name: Victims Refuse Silence
advocacy_organizations.description: Founded by victims including Virginia Giuffre

important_notes: This list is NOT exhaustive. Many victims have chosen to remain anonymous.
Estimates suggest 100+ total victims based on investigation records and compensation claims.
Only victims who have publicly identified themselves are listed by name.
Age ranges are at time of abuse, not current ages.
Some victims became recruiters under coercion/grooming.
Many victims suffered long-term psychological trauma and continue recovery.
Respect for victim privacy is paramount - do not attempt to identify anonymous victims.
research_methodology: All information compiled from court testimony, public legal filings, verified media interviews, and official government documents. No speculation or unverified claims included.
sources: Court documents and testimony from multiple cases
